import thunk from'redux-thunk';import createHistory from'history/createBrowserHistory';import rootReducer from'./reducers';export var history=createHistory();var initialState={};var enhancers=[];var middleware=[thunk];if(process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'){var devToolsExtension=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__;if(typeof devToolsExtension==='function')enhancers.push(devToolsExtension());}var composeEnhancers=compose.apply(void 0,[applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)].concat(enhancers));var store=createStore(rootReducer(history),initialState,composeEnhancers);export default store;
